snippet.title: Extreme Road Trip 2 Now Available!
snippet.description:
http://www.ExtremeRoadTrip2.com

Music by Big Giant Circles: http://music.biggiantcircles.com

Extreme Road Trip 2 coming soon!

Extreme Road Trip 2 is the sequel to the wildly popular Extreme Road Trip. The game will be released on iOS and Android, and features the same awesome gameplay of the first game with new additions:

- slam your car by holding both sides of the screen to land crazy stunts and get mega boosts
- pick up coins as you play that you can use to unlock and upgrade cars
- see your friends' ghosts inside your game and compete against them for distance and speed

Extreme Road Trip 2 will be released worldwide on November 1st on the App Store and on Google Play.
